authenticated.suffix:
, puede intentar con las cuentas predeterminadas:
- Administrador (usuario="admin" y contraseña="admin")
- Usuario (usuario="user" y contraseña="user").

register.noaccount: Don't you have an account yet?

error.dontmatch: Password and password confirmation do not match!

newpassword.required: You are required to enter a password.
newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 4 characters long
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be more than 50 characters

confirmpassword.required: You are required to confirm the password.
confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 4 characters long
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters

email.minlength: Your email is required to be at least 5 characters long
email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters

validation.minlength: This field requires at least {{min}} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot exceed more than {{max}} characters.
validation.min: This field must be greater than {{min}}.
validation.max: This field cannot be greater than {{max}}.
validation.minbytes: This field must be at least {{min}} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{max}} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field must follow the pattern {{pattern}}.
validation.number: This field must be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field must be a date and time.

error.Size: The field {{fieldName}} does not meet the minimum / maximum size requirements!
error.emailexists: The email account is already in use!
error.idexists: A new {{entityName}} cannot have an ID

file.not.image: File was expected to be an image but was found to be "{{ fileType }}"
